name: Bizarre Earthquake
description: Bizarre Earthquake is a third-person point & click adventure game. The story is about a seismologist and her assistant who try to uncover the mysteries behind a bizarre earthquake they encounter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Pentium IV 1 Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9.0 compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: Funny...When i click on Bora he said : Damn. I am Handsome! 10/10 BORA DRKACA...DRLJACA* CAR !!!

A '2016' release and it can't even run in 720p without black bars?  No windowed mode, no video options at all and the game starts up with a permanent glitch with the black bars and steam overlay pop up. If you bring up the overlay entirely it wil become the black bars permanently. If you have an older plasma tv like me this is your worst enemy...  I was gifted this game from a friend as a cruel joke. I tried to play this, I really did.. Don't spend any of your money on this trash.
